name: CluePix
description:
CluePix

CluePix is a picture solving game. Fill the grid following those 2 rules:

  • Stacked colors must be used in their row or column,
  • Each digit must fit the number of same color neighbors.

Once a picture is solved, it is saved and reloaded on next game sessions, so no hurry, even though the game may be short anyway. CluePix is a proof of concept which is the main part of a bigger game currently in progress, which release is planned for october 2022. As such feel free to comment on what you liked or didn't about CluePix!

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move cursor
  • 🅾️ or C to add/remove pixels
  • ❎  or X to switch between grid  and palette. Press twice to pick a grid color.
